abstract: Report by coalition of elected officials, property owners and business leaders in New York City offers suggestions for dealing with topless women and others who solicit money from tourists in Times Square; recommends pedestrian plaza be divided into distinct zones for commercial activity, walking and public events.
lead_paragraph: A coalition of elected officials, property owners and business leaders have proposed setting aside areas in Times Square for cash solicitors.

headline.main: Special Zones Proposed to Limit Toplessness in Times Square
headline.print_headline: Plan to Limit Toplessness in Times Sq.: Special Zones

snippet: A coalition of elected officials, property owners and business leaders have proposed setting aside areas in Times Square for cash solicitors.
